TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ProfileOptimization extends System.Object
public ref class ProfileOptimization abstract sealed

summary.span: 提高应用程序在应用范围的启动性能需要通过 just-in-time (JIT) 编辑器根据以前版本中生成的配置文件来执行那么可能要执行的背景编辑方法。

span.span: Improves the startup performance of application domains in applications that require the just-in-time (JIT) compiler by performing background compilation of methods that are likely to be executed, based on profiles created during previous compilations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 配置文件优化需要多核计算机。Profile optimization requires a multicore computer. 方法将忽略其他计算机上。The methods are ignored on other computers. 每次启动应用程序域中的配置文件优化读取在以前的使用过程中创建的配置文件。Each time you initiate profile optimization in an application domain, the profile that was created during the previous use is read. 在配置文件中的信息用于指导通过识别最有可能在启动期间执行的方法的后台编译。The information in the profile is used to guide background compilation by identifying the methods that are most likely to be executed during startup. 多核计算机上，这样会增加的可能性的一种方法是已编译时需要它，以便主应用程序线程不能调用 JIT 编译器。On multicore computers, this increases the chances that a method is already compiled by the time it is needed so that the main application thread does not have to call the JIT compiler. 配置文件会覆盖在每次使用，因此它始终包含在启动过程的使用方法的最新信息。The profile file is overwritten on each use, so it always contains the most recent information about which methods are used during startup. 优化配置文件不会限制为应用程序域启动。Optimization profiles are not restricted to application domain startup. 它们可以用于将需要大量使用 JIT 编译器的任何活动。They can be used for any activity that will require heavy use of the JIT compiler. 您可以维护应用程序域的多个配置文件，以便每个此类活动有自己的配置文件。You can maintain multiple profiles for an application domain so that each such activity has its own profile. 若要在应用程序域中使用优化配置文件，必须调用方法并指定存储配置文件的文件夹。To use optimization profiles in an application domain, you must call the method and specify the folder where profiles are stored. 文件夹必须已经存在。The folder must already exist. 若要开始使用配置文件，请调用方法和指定的配置文件的文件的名称。To begin using a profile, call the method and specify the file name of the profile. 如果以前未录制该文件，它会创建第一次使用。If the file was not recorded previously, it is created on first use. 创建一个配置文件没有性能权益第一个时间。There is no performance benefit the first time a profile is created. 配置优化不会更改方法的执行顺序。Profile optimization does not change the order in which methods are executed. 在后台线程中; 不执行方法如果编译但永远不会调用一个方法，它只是不使用。Methods are not executed on the background thread; if a method is compiled but never called, it is simply not used. 如果配置文件已损坏或无法写入指定的文件夹 （例如，因为该文件夹不存在），而无需优化分析继续执行程序。If a profile file is corrupt or cannot be written to the specified folder (for example, because the folder does not exist), program execution continues without optimization profiling.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void SetProfileRoot(string directoryPath) cil managed
Public Shared Sub SetProfileRoot (directoryPath As String)

param.name: directoryPath
param.span: 到存储配置文件用于当前应用程序域的的文件夹的完整路径。

span.span: The full path to the folder where profile files are stored for the current application domain.

summary.span: 启用当前应用程序域的优化配置，并设置存储优化配置文件的文件夹。

span.span: Enables optimization profiling for the current application domain, and sets the folder where the optimization profile files are stored.

summary.span: 在单核计算机上，此方法被忽略。

span.span: On a single-core computer, the method is ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用之前，必须调用此方法第一次当前的应用程序域中的方法。You must call this method before you call the method for the first time in the current application domain. 如果调用不止一次在同一个应用程序域中，第一个之后的所有调用将被都忽略。If you call more than once in the same application domain, all calls after the first are ignored. 必须已存在指定的文件夹。The specified folder must already exist. 如果不存在，调用此方法不会创建它，并没有分析。If it does not exist, calling this method does not create it, and no profiling occurs. 不具有多个内核的计算机上，此方法将被忽略。On computers that do not have multiple cores, this method is ignored.

permission.span: 直接调用方需要完全信任。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 不能由部分受信任的或透明的代码使用此成员。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void StartProfile(string profile) cil managed
Public Shared Sub StartProfile (profile As String)

param.name: profile
param.span: 要使用的配置文件的文件名。

span.span: The file name of the profile to use.

summary.span: 启动方法的实时 (JIT) 编译，这些方法记录在后台线程上的指定配置文件中。

span.span: Starts just-in-time (JIT) compilation of the methods that were previously recorded in the specified profile file, on a background thread.

summary.span: 开始记录当前方法使用的过程，之后复盖指定的配置文件。

span.span: Starts the process of recording current method use, which later overwrites the specified profile file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的配置文件中指定的文件夹存在方法，它包含的信息用于确定方法在后台线程将编译的顺序。If the specified profile exists in the folder specified by the method, the information it contains is used to determine the order in which methods are compiled on the background thread. 方法将创建该配置文件，如果它尚不存在，并启动方法使用的记录。The method creates the profile if it does not already exist, and initiates the recording of method use. 记录实际调用的方法，而不考虑它们是否编译后台线程上或在主应用程序的线程。Only methods that are actually called are recorded, regardless of whether they were compiled on the background thread or on the main application thread. 一种方法是在主应用程序线程上编译，如果应用程序需要调用它之前的后台线程已编译。A method is compiled on the main application thread if the application needs to call it before the background thread has compiled it. 执行该录制的代码跟踪的方法将被编译，包括这两个后台线程上和在主线程上编译的方法的速率。The code that performs the recording tracks the rate at which methods are compiled, including methods that are compiled on both the background thread and on the main thread. 如果速率低于预先确定的级别，录制停止。When the rate falls below a predetermined level, recording stops. 如果 JIT 编译的速率超过预先确定的上限，也会停止录制。Recording also stops if the rate of JIT compilation exceeds a predetermined upper limit. 如果不为当前的应用程序域中，调用方法或如果计算机不具有多个内核，方法不起作用。If the method has not been called for the current application domain, or if the computer does not have multiple cores, the method has no effect.

permission.span: 直接调用方需要完全信任。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 不能由部分受信任的或透明的代码使用此成员。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
